main event: A disc-shaped object was observed at the Travis County Prison in Georgia on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having a dome and emitting red smoke from its exhaust., The UFO exhibited a zig-zag flight path during the observation., The sighting lasted for 10 minutes., The observer used binoculars to spot the object, which was very high and extremely fast., The object faded from sight in a south-west direction.
sighted object: one disc-shaped object with a dome
witness description: A civilian observer scanning the sky with binoculars from a tower.
